library-construction-16s-rrna-based_pcr_: Viral DNA was isolated by a formamide/CTAB extraction19 and amplified with GenomiPhi (GE Healthcare) following the manufacturer's recommendations.
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: Microbialites were collected in November 2005 from the Highborne Cay Island in the Bahamas. Multiple subsamples were combined from the Highborne Cay stromatolites (Highborne Cay, site 3) and used as one sample.
sequences_sequences_combined_libraries: DNA was generated from the three libraries (Pozas Azules II: 32 Mbp, Rio Mesquites: 35 Mbp and Highborne Cay: 15 Mbp)
